title: Help me rank up
body: Im gonna try and rank up over the next few weeks of school holidays but i have encountered a problem. I almost always have at least 1 feeder. Im looking for someone mid silver to help me out of bronze. I dont really mind what lane as i can play any lane. If ur interested my discord is SirSpaghettiLord#7584

replies.body: He is basically asking for a booster to help him rank up.
inching my way up. Occasionally i get a feeder, bad player or afk. Occasionally i have a bad game but im up to my promos which if i win i will be in b2

I'm going to do it mostly on my own. I might get help from my brother but he isnt a much higher rank. I got plenty of time to get to silver especially when i just reached my promos which will get me into b2

Ok no hate, but you don't need someone a tier and a half above you to help you climb, and I'm about 100% sure that if you really could play every lane decent enough, you wouldn't need help climbing. Find 1 or 2 lanes and 1 or 2 champs and play the absolute dog shit out of them. Odds are, you'll get good enough at your chosen champ that you will draw aggro from other lanes/jgler, and if you can deal with the extra pressure, you basically win the game there.

The Will of Bronze is always gonna have 1 feeder 

Bronze is toxic atm
Git Gud, don't rely on others

look up league videos IMLS is a great youtuber for learning there are other things like reddit
to help you with learning videos too and you can look up youtuber videos.
